channel.title: Trying an Ask Me Anything a la Holman
channel.description:
This isn't really a product show & tell, rather a concept show & tell.
A few weeks back I mentioned on Twitter that I was considering having weekly "office hours". I'd make myself available on a Google Hangout and people could come in and ask me questions about business, development, DNSimple, whatever. At least one response mentioned Zach Holman's feedback repository, which is basically a place where people can open Github issues and ask questions and Zach (or other people) can answer them.
I've decided to give this a try myself, so I've opened up [github.com/aeden/ama](http://github.com/aeden/ama). If you're interested feel free to drop in and ask a question and I'll do my best to answer. I'll post back here in a few weeks to let everyone know how this experiment goes.

item.title: Trying an Ask Me Anything a la Holman
item.dc:creator: aeden
item.description:
This isn’t really a product show & tell, rather a concept show & tell.

A few weeks back I mentioned on Twitter that I was considering having weekly “office hours”. I’d make myself available on a Google Hangout and people could come in and ask me questions about business, development, DNSimple, whatever. At least one response mentioned Zach Holman’s feedback repository, which is basically a place where people can open Github issues and ask questions and Zach (or other people) can answer them.

I’ve decided to give this a try myself, so I’ve opened up github.com/aeden/ama. If you’re interested feel free to drop in and ask a question and I’ll do my best to answer. I’ll post back here in a few weeks to let everyone know how this experiment goes.
